Description:
Rural Getaway on The Bellarine
At the end of the tree lined drive, past a small planting of pinot noir vines sits a light filled, mid-century modern style, well proportioned, 3 bedroom family home. Beautifully situated on 1.2ha, with views onto neighbouring vineyards, this residence offers generous family living with zoned spaces together with an enviable garden and entertaining area overlooking the pool.
The first of 2 living spaces has a stunning wood fire and large windows with views to the garden. Timber beamed ceilings and slate flooring in the entrance and throughout the home adds texture and durability and there is plenty of storage on offer here. The well laid out kitchen has plenty of room to move and a large bench that overlooks the adjoining dining area. There is a laundry with handy access to outside and family bathroom with shower and toilet converts to a powder room for guests.
The second family room is a flexible space that leads to the courtyard and pool. There’s an extra room with folding doors here that could be an ideal study, home office, playroom or guest accommodation. Two bedrooms, both with BIRs and garden views are located at the same end of the house to complete a family wing. The master suite is at the front of the home, away from the noise of the kids and guests! Complete with an ensuite and WIR, this bedroom has a lovely view onto the vineyard and is a peaceful retreat.
Across 1.2ha, this property has beautiful gardens, large sheds and a fabulous entertaining area focused around a pool and spa. The pool house, located off the bricked courtyard is a great space for summer dining and catching some relief from the hot summer sun. Nearby, the grassed area in front of the vineyard offers a great place for kids play and the potential for extending the planting.
A fantastic rural location that is close to beaches, shops and golf clubs, this property is an incredible opportunity to realise your rural Bellarine dream.
Insights: 61-69 Navarre Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Perfect Hyde A Way
Simply stunning this Porter Davis family home will you have you packing your bags to move in. Grand entry with wide halls & lovely floors. Master bedroom has 3 windows with views of the Griggs creeks & parklands, it's spacious plus complemented by a large ensuite with his & hers basins. Bedrooms 2 & 3 are both big & have BIR's. A 4th bedroom has been converted in the double car garage, options are endless, you could keep this room for a home business or simply convert back to a garage. Devine central bathroom has a luxurious deep bath to relax & unwind in. Also a fantastic study which has sliding doors, built in desks & backyard views. Open plan kitchen dining & family is nothing short of perfection with a reverse cycle split system. Kitchen features stone bench tops, glass splash back, stainless appliances including a 900mm electric oven, 5 burner gas cook top & dishwasher plus a walk in pantry. Another lounge is great space with large windows & pergola views. Also gas ducted heating throughout. Outside is a great undercover entertainment pergola with cafe blinds to keep the weather away. Still enough yard to enjoy some gardening or for kids & pets to play on a 480m2 block. Close to shops, schools, cafes, public transport, medical facilities, local wineries & also the bay. Your Bellarine lifestyle awaits you!
Insights: 9 Hyde Way, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 14 other 3 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Move in straight away with nothing to do!
This near new 3 bedroom home is an ideally located within easy distance to Drysdale Village, local Primary Schools, Christian College Bellarine, Geelong CBD in 15 minutes and all that the Bellarine has to offer including wineries, quality beaches and entertainment options.
Offering great affordability, this home is positioned on 437m2 (approx) allotment and comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, main with walk in robe, 2 bathrooms, large open living/dining and kitchen area. Other features include ducted heating and split system cooling for year round comfort, double garage with internal access, contemporary interiors including neutral colour scheme, window furnishings, low maintenance gardens, side access for boats or caravans and much more.
Whether you're searching for your first home, a home to start a family, or an investment to add to your portfolio, your search is over!

Description:
What A Ripper!
Without a doubt this property offers purchasers one of the best entry level homes in the local market! Set within a lovely pocket of Curlewis flanked by child friendly parkland's and cleverly placed to take full advantage of all local conveniences. All the work is done and this property is ready to call home 'or' an exceptional addition to your property portfolio.
• A lovely street appeal creates a warm and welcoming environment; established gardens, a hardwood decked walkway and an exposed aggregate driveway are all inviting features.
• Courtesy of a lovely north easterly orientation the main living area is bathed in natural light; big window fixtures further enhance the 'light and bright feel'. Dual glass sliding doors create a seamless inside/outside living zone – the expansive deck creates a lovely area to entertain 'or' take in a relaxed coffee in the morning.
• The kitchen serves up a practical design; expansive bench space, excellent storage solutions and modern appliances provide further conveniences.
• 3 bedrooms; the master suite is complete with ensuite and a generous walk in robe. A trio of full span windows continue the theme of 'light and bright' and a ceiling fan for comfort.
• A family friendly backyard has established trees and creates a private setting; a custom built work shop provides further storage solutions.
• An attractive feature of this property is a rear roller door which further endorses this properties user friendly nature – off street boat, van and/or trailer accommodation.
• All the modern comforts ensure this property ticks all boxes and will be highly sought after in the market place.

Description:
Come Enjoy This Home
Move, unpack & enjoy this 3 bedroom family Geelong Home which is just waiting to be yours. Just a mere 6 years old that has a perfect location to parks, shops, schools & even the bay. Spacious master is light filled with street views completed by a full ensuite featuring a double sized shower & also a walk in robe. Shining white tiles lead you to a generous open plan living area with separate dining & carpeted lounge zones. Modern kitchen with stylish stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher with a 900mm electric oven & gas 5 burner cook top with range hood just perfect to keep any cooking enthusiast happy. Bedrooms 2 & 3 are both large & have lots of storage each with 3 built in robes. Second living is perfect for either just the kids or to watch your own favourite tv shows separately. Central chic bathroom features a lavish deep bath to relax & soak away in, single vanity basin & separate shower. Additional features are solar boosted gas ducted heating & a reverse cycle split system. Outside is a fantastic deck for entertaining having summer bbq's or too just sit & watch the kids play. Plus a gated separate yard with turf & a garden shed which is perfect for a dog run. Double garage has a remote panel lift door with internal access. All this sits picture perfect on a 514m2 allotment.

Description:
Simply The Best
A luxuriously appointed build of the highest calibre is sure to impress; a stunning façade provides just a hint of the quality that lays within.
•A contemporary open plan design delivers a wonderfully light and bright experience; further enhanced 2700 high ceilings throughout
•3 bedrooms and a study; master complete with ensuite, walk in robe and corner set window feature
•An eye catching kitchen showcases lovely modern lines; 20mm dual stone benchtops, gloss vinyl wrap kitchen cabinetry, stainless steel appliances and a feature glass window
•The main living area is without doubt one of the finest in today's property market, towering raked ceilings, designer window furnishings and dual glass sliding doors provide a seamless connection to a decked alfresco zone with a wonderful northerly orientation.
• Continuing with the luxurious theme; the ensuite and bathroom boast 20mm quartz stone benchtops, quality fittings and oversized shower
• High raked ceilings, doubled glazed windows and top shelf finishes throughout further endorse this homes standing in the market place.
• Landscaped gardens provide a lovely private and tranquil setting. 2 decked alfresco zones take full advantage of a northerly orientation
• A Firmadoor Panelmasta double garage with remote control, internal access and independent pedestrian access to the rear.
• A++ central location places you walking distance to beautiful parklands, schools, medical services and local amenities.

Description:
The Perfect Family Home
Located in the Bayview Estate, this immaculately maintained contemporary home has been built with the highest of quality by Long Island Homes. The home boasts a generous open-plan living and dining area including a stylishly appointed kitchen with stone bench tops and glass splash back. An adjoining living area offers plenty additional space for the growing family to fully appreciate. Comprising of four bedrooms, the master bedroom with a generous walk-in robe and ensuite whilst the other three spacious bedrooms all have built-in robes. A covered alfresco entertaining area, a private and secure rear yard and a double garage with direct internal access. Positioned on a comparatively large corner allotment of 507sqm (approx). This superbly presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a walking track to the bay, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private and access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants and wineries - all of which enhances the lifestyle appeal of this prestigious location.

Modern lifestyle in perfect location
Contemporary, fresh & only 2 years old, this home is ideally situated within an easy walk of Curlewis Shopping Centre.
A well appointed open plan modern kitchen, dining & lounge with an abundance of storage space.
Enjoy the peace & comfort of the large lounge with reverse cycle air conditioner.
The spacious king sized master bedroom with modern ensuite & walk in robe. The three other bedrooms have built in robes with plenty of storage room.
Central heating throughout.
A Large double garage with plenty of room for a workshop and two cars will fit comfortably.
A modern home close to all amenities in the Curlewis and Drysdale area. Walking distance to the Curlewis shopping precinct and public transport only a stone throw away makes this a home a must to inspect.
Only minutes away from the Jetty Road boat ramp & walks along the cliff tops & beaches, this magnificent home will be highly sought after by the astute buyer for an ideal low maintenance investment property.

Designer Touch
The calming neutral tones of the interior of this magnificent property combined with the warmth of the beautiful timber flooring, stone kitchen bench tops add a designer touch to the practical and inviting open plan layout of this home. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances and ample storage while the second living area is the perfect space for a kids activity, sitting room or office.

With ducted heating throughout the home, split system cooling and a delightful garden outlook from the kitchen and living and for the budget conscience, 6 solar panels that equate to 1500 watts of energy saving power.
This home ticks all the right boxes, Call to book your inspection today.

Description:
LUXURY LIVING
This near new immaculate home sitting on approx. 512m2 of land boasts all of today’s modern luxuries. With 4 generous bedrooms all featuring BIR and WWC, bright bathroom with stone top vanity, kids activity room/study with data points and the generously proportioned Master bedroom featuring WWC, a spacious WIR and full ensuite.
The kitchen boasts stone benchtops, a 900mm SS freestanding oven and rangehood, Bosch dishwasher, built in under bench microwave cabinet and has a large walk through pantry into the laundry. The welcoming open layout of the kitchen, dining and living with sliding door to the spacious rear undercover alfresco make this an ideal gathering place for family and friends. The entire home is warmed with ducted heating and kept cool in the warmer months with ducted evaporative cooling. Good quality double roller blinds allow for privacy and climate control and downlights throughout the home add a touch of class. This home truly ticks off all the items on your wish list and an inspection will definitely impress!

Description:

This large spacious home comes with all the bits you would ever want, with 5 bedrooms to boot. This home is perfect for the large family, or the retiree looking for plenty of room for the grand kids to stay. Two large living area's and a well equipped kitchen. This home is ready to move into. This property is sure to excite, ticking all the boxes, in a location close to all the Bellarine has to offer. i.e. wineries, schools, shops, beaches, fishing and much much more. Description:
Neat Little Number
What we have on offer is a gorgeous home, ideal for first home buyers, young families and investors alike.
This neatly presented home is sure to impress from the moment you walk in. The open plan kitchen/living/dining is the heart of the home. The kitchen is equipped with SS appliances, 900ml electric oven, 5 burner gas-top stove, range-hood and dishwasher. The light-filled living space offers sliding doors that float out to a private courtyard, perfect for those summer BBQ's. The master bedroom offers a generous walk-through robe and en-suite, with the 3 remaining bedrooms all with built-in robes. Each room also cleverly includes Foxtel and data points. The backyard is a blank canvas, ready for you to add your own flare! Other features include evaporate cooling, ducted heating, DLUG with internal access, all while being NBN ready and upon a 419m2 allotment.
This property will tick all the boxes when it comes to location. A short 700m stroll to the supermarket, doctors, 24-hour chemist, variety shops and cafes are all at your finger-tips. Also while being a short drive to everything the Bellarine has on offer - Award winning wineries, boat ramps, golf clubs and the town center of Drysdale. Be Quick! Your new lifestyle awaits you

Description:
Solid Investment Property
Interested in a solid investment property in the rapidly expanding area of Curlewis on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsular. Approximately three years young with long term tenants in lease until November 2019. Located within walking distance to the local shopping precinct and beautifully landscaped parks on the emerging Curlewis Parks estate. The home comprises two living areas, four queen sized bedrooms, two bathrooms and the modern convenience of gas central heating and evaporative cooling, 900mm gas cooker and stone bench tops. The front garden has been landscaped. The rear of the property has a low maintenance yard and a covered outdoor entertaining area.

POSITION, PLUS SO MUCH MORE
The perfect downsizer or investment property. This 5 year old home offers a fantastic entry into the popular Curlewis market. Located in a quiet street and only minutes drive to Curlewis Shopping Centre. Offering great affordability, this home is positioned on 399m2 (approx) allotment and comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 with BIRobes, 1 walk in robe, 2 bathrooms, open living/dining and kitchen area. Whether you're searching for your first home, a home to start a family, or an investment to add to your portfolio, your search is over! A very rewarding opportunity in a growth suburb.The property is currently tenanted. Description:
BESPOKE HOME IN A PRIZED LOCATION
This architecturally designed bespoke home sitting proudly on a 927 sq meter block of land was thoughtfully designed around spaces specifically for entertaining, quiet enjoyment and views. The views of Melbourne’s skyline over Port Phillip Bay, You Yangs and Corio Bay are all obtained from the private balcony and theatre room upstairs whilst downstairs open plan living flows seamlessly onto the alfresco entertaining area with stone topped wet bar, fridges, BBQ and fire pit. Perfectly positioned only 1 street back from the prized waterfront and walking tracks of Clifton Springs and Curlewis, this is a home for the ages with a long list of amazing attributes:
• Open plan kitchen meals and family room flowing onto the outdoor entertaining space.
• Theatre room upstairs with northerly day and night views over Port Phillip bay and Melbourne skyline.
• Formal and informal downstairs living spaces for comfort for the entire family unit.
• Large master bedroom suite with full ensuite, walk-in change room and private north facing balcony.
• A further 3 queen sized bedrooms with built in robes.
• Ample storage throughout both storeys of this fabulous design.
• Office at the front entrance ideal for consultancy or working from home.
This 4 year old home is ideal for those looking for a seachange whilst still allowing for space and privacy. To organise a private inspection of this property, Call Daniel Lamanna today on 0413 795 994.

Description:
INCOME NOW / MOVE IN LATER
That's right, this property comes with a current tenancy for the next 10 months, then renew or move in, your choice. Not only that but this home comes with four bedrooms main with full ensuite, the others with built in robes and all carpeted. The home's central area comprises of bright open plan kitchen, dining and living, opening up to the Alfresco space and yard at the rear. Gas ducted heating keeps you warm in winter and in summer a reverse cycle split system takes care of the heat. The kitchen is fitted out with some quality appliances you would come to expect with dishwasher, electric oven and gas cooktop. This property has a lovely spacious rear yard with a land size of 525 sqm. Set amongst well established homes, landscaped streets and close proximity to all the Bellarine has to offer in the way of lifestyle, wineries and schools, this home represents a complete family lifestyle.
This property is a must see, if you are contemplating a purchase on the Bellarine.

All There and All Done

Immaculately presented for the discerning buyer to inspect now. The block has an 18 metre frontage that allows side access to the rear of the property whilst the outdoor entertaining area is perfectly positioned to capture the north-facing aspect. The gardens are established and easy to maintain with feature shrubs and fruit varieties. Inspection a must.
